mapper.update:
UPDATE SYS_DICT
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_key = #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_type = #{dictType,jdbcType=CHAR},
dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_desc = #{dictDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guid_parents = #{guidParents,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
default_value = #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
from_table = #{fromTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_for_key = #{useForKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_for_name = #{useForName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
mapper.sql: guid as guid ,dict_key as dictKey ,dict_type as dictType ,dict_name as dictName ,dict_desc as dictDesc ,guid_parents as guidParents ,default_value as defaultValue ,from_table as fromTable ,use_for_key as useForKey ,use_for_name as useForName ,seqno as seqno
